summary: 1963  was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Sir John Carew Eccles, AC FRS FRACP FRSNZ FAAS  was an Australian neurophysiologist and philosopher who won the 1963 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for his work on the synapse. He shared the prize with Andrew Huxley and Alan Lloyd Hodgkin.
title: Sir John Carew Eccles
